> <OLD>
>
> From his observation post, Quickstride could sense the worry in=
 Rodimus's
voice. He too was worried and continues to keep his ears and eye=
s peeled in
all directions. He paws his left front hoof.
>
> " Just what I =
was thinkn' Rodimus. I wonder if they got tipped off about
our plan of acti=
on.. Slippery stuff when there's a mole involved that we
don't know about..=
"
>
> From where Night Shift was, he could not see the seekers, yet, just b=
y his
radar systems, he could definitely tell that there was a flying briga=
de
around the fortress. He slowly comes to a stop.

<NEW>

=93Be careful ou=
t there.=94 Rodimus said as something came to mind with the talk
about a mo=
le, =93I remember that one of the new guys could turn invisible.=94
Rodimus=
 paused trying to remember who it was, but finally continued, =93I am
not s=
ure which one, they had just arrived. One of them could easily be
watching =
us and we would never know it.=94

OOC: Keep in mind, unless you are at or =
near the Pred base scanning it would
be difficult. The same can be said for=
 the Maximal base. If you=92re at the
pred base, scanning the Max base woul=
d be next to impossible without some
sort of satellite or specialized gear.=


> <OLD>
>
> "I got an idea. It's a long shot, no pun intended but it migh=
t work. I am
equipped with long range equipment. What if Kup used me as a c=
ross bow, to
take out some of those seekers, create a diversion so that way=
 Windlord and
Rat Trap could make it inside?"
>
> Night Shift spins a tire.=

>
> "I dunno, sounds risky... What if they barrel after us? I ain't a
spee=
dster."
>
> Straight Shot looks at him.
>
> " It's worth a shot. Let's run =
it by Tucson."
>
> Tucson now recieves a message from Straight Shot. He pon=
ders the daring
move.
>
> "Hmm, that would work as a diversion but it's ext=
remely risky... But
nothing we've never dealth with before.. All right, per=
haps it is necesary
to make a move. Straight Shot, Kup, I want you to posit=
ion yourselves as
best you can. Kup, take robot mode, Straight Shot, cross =
bow mode, and
program your trajectory settings to long range. Be sure to co=
nceal
yourselves amply. Night Shift, I'll need you to remain in vehicle mod=
e, for
a quick getaway. Rodimus, Quickstride, it has now come to my attenti=
on that
unless a diversion is executed, Rat Trap and Windlord may not make =
it into
the fortress safely. Straight Shot is going to provide the diversio=
n along
with Kup's help. Be prepared, once this diversion is in place, we m=
ay need
you two to get into battle mode to fend off any seeker that tries t=
o attempt
an attack on the Ark. I know these changes are sudden, but unfort=
unately,
there is a lot of uncertainty in this mission. All right, battle s=
tations
everyone, things are about to get rocky."
>

<NEW>

Out ahead of th=
e group the sweeps continue to fly through the air, seemingly
unaware of th=
e Maximals and Autobots that are preparing for their attack.
They swoop aro=
und, obviously in some sort of patrol pattern, flying first
over one sectio=
n and then over another. Their movements are surprisingly
well orchestrated=
, they are either seasoned hunters or they have been
trained by one who is.=
 The air beneath their flight path rippled with heat,
the magma beneath the=
m was incredibly hot.

=93I gotcha.=94 Rodimus said over the radio comlink =
to Tuscon. =93We are ready
here back at the base should anyone of the Preda=
cons get foolish and attack
us.=94

Rodimus paused and then continued, =93A=
lso, I think I remember that one of the
new guys that came with Cyclonus wh=
en he returned could turn invisible, and
I think even teleport. I can=92t r=
emember which one, but be very careful out
there.=94

(TAG)

Preston

></div>

<div>> "I got an idea. It's a long s=
hot, no pun intended but it might work. I am equipped with long range equip=
ment. What if Kup used me as a cross bow, to take out some of those seekers=
, create a diversion so that way Windlord and Rat Trap could make it inside=
?"</div>

<div>></div>
<div>> Night Shift spins a tire.</div>
<d=
iv>></div>
<div>> "I dunno, sounds risky... What if they barrel =
after us? I ain't a speedster."</div>
<div>></div>
<div>> St=
raight Shot looks at him.</div>
<div>></div>
<div>> " It's w=
orth a shot. Let's run it by Tucson."</div>
<div>></div>
<div>&=
gt; Tucson now recieves a message from Straight Shot. He ponders the daring=
 move.</div>
<div>></div>
<div>> "Hmm, that would work as a dive=
rsion but it's extremely risky... But nothing we've never dealth wi=
th before.. All right, perhaps it is necesary to make a move. Straight Shot=
, Kup, I want you to position yourselves as best you can. Kup, take robot m=
ode, Straight Shot, cross bow mode, and program your trajectory settings to=
 long range. Be sure to conceal yourselves amply. Night Shift, I'll nee=
d you to remain in vehicle mode, for a quick getaway. Rodimus, Quickstride,=
 it has now come to my attention that unless a diversion is executed, Rat T=
rap and Windlord may not make it into the fortress safely. Straight Shot is=
 going to provide the diversion along with Kup's help. Be prepared, onc=
e this diversion is in place, we may need you two to get into battle mode t=
o fend off any seeker that tries to attempt an attack on the Ark. I know th=
ese changes are sudden, but unfortunately, there is a lot of uncertainty in=
 this mission. All right, battle stations everyone, things are about to get=
 rocky."</div>

<div>></div>
<div>=A0</div>

 swoop around, obviously in some sort of patrol pattern, flying first over =
one section and then over another. Their movements are surprisingly well or=
chestrated, they are either seasoned hunters or they have been trained by o=
ne who is. The air beneath their flight path rippled with heat, the magma b=
eneath them was incredibly hot.</font></div>
